medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started one week ago, initially thought to be muscle strain. Pain has not resolved, with no fevers or chills. Patient reported continued flatulence and good appetite.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, Hepatitis C, Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (BPH), Coronary Artery Disease, Hypothyroidism, Anxiety, Lumbar Disk Disease. Previous surgeries include back surgery and cataract removal in the left eye.
medical_history.family_history: Lung cancer in brother and 'bone cancer' in sister.
